column5: I just watched this documentary about the famous1970's Broad Street Bullies. If you like hockey you will love this one Enjoy  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJgMQDkyJH0

Funny, I just saw a 30 for 30 doc about the Spirits of St Louis from ABA in the mid 70's.  Pro sports in the 70's might have been more out of control then just about other era. On, and off, the courts, fields and rinks.
